lines.text: Ooh, silk drawers and a red tie. I gotta wear these together! Get off me ladies. I hear those ladies callin' my name, 'Shame, Shame!' Leave me alone, stop tuggin' at my silk drawers, don't love me like you do!
Are you makin' fun of me?
Hell, yeah!
You hurt Shame again, and you betta watch yo' back!
Salt-N-Pepa must had a garage sale.
Yoo-hoo Wayman.
Hey Bernard.
Excuse me, who's this?
This is Bernard and what's wrong with you?
"The Bernard"?
Yes it's me.
Homewrecker. He's with me.
Shame. I can't believe you just.
You are my stuff and you know it girl.
Stuff?
Bernard he's lying. Don't believe him.
Oh you did not say that last night when we was in bed together girl.
You slept with him? You slut!
Save your tears honey you never had a chance. Coffee's good with cream, but better when it's black.
Don't you ever call me again. And for you Mr. Coffee, if you like a little steamed milk with your double expresso, I'm your man.
Bernard I'm sorry. I'll call you.
Shame why did you do that?
If you help me find this girl, I'll call and tell him it was a joke.
I'll go take me a shower and pretend that I didn't wake up in The Crying Game!
Luis says that the white man can kiss his butt!
[to Luis]
Tell 'em you're friends with Al Sharpton.
[Rides off]
Black Power! Black Power!
Calm down.
Oh, no.
Calm down! It's not blood, just wine.
[Louder]
And the nominees for best actress in a groovy nightclub drama... Miss Wayman Harrington!

[after Shame lies about him and Wayman]
He's lying! Don't believe him, Bernard. Don't believe him.
Oh, you didn't say that last night when we was in bed together, girl!
You *slept* with him? You *slut*!
[slaps Wayman senseless]
Bernard?
Save your tears, honey, you never had a chance! Coffee's good with cream but better when it's black!
Don't you ever, *ever* call me again. And you "Mr. Coffee", if you like some steamed milk with your double espresso, I'm your man!
Bernard, I'm sorry! I promise I'll call you.

[simultaneously]
Don't sorry me, Wayman!
You remeber when we first met.
Yeah. I busted you stuffin' CD's in your underwear.
Well Whatever. I liked you. And I was only 16 and I knew it wouldnt work. Now, I'm 22 going on 23. Can't you see how much I've grown?
You mean you ain't wearin' that trainer no more?
This is Fremi.
"Frem-may".
This is "Frem-me", with an I, not an e.

Oh, so you wanna box, is that what it is? You want some of this? You know what? There ain't nothin' to it, but to do it. You know what I'm sayin', all we gotta do is push this to the side and there ain't nothing but space and opportunity here. You know what I'm sayin'? Do you want some of this?

[to Chun Yung Fat]
You. Nice and slow, toss those over to me.
[Chun Yung Fat throws the bag of diamonds between Shame and the Mob Boss' Bodyguard]

[to the bodyguard]
Now, if I bend down to pick those up, are you gonna try to kill me?

[He doesn't reply, so Shame takes off the bodyguard's sunglasses]
Come on... be honest.
Fucking-a right. I'm gonna kill your ass!
[Shame kicks him in the balls]

[to the bodyguard]
You stupid fuck!
Say hi to Arnold!
[Knocks the bodyguard out]
